summary:
My Vision

Changing the world starts with curiosity. It is the force that drives us to new discoveries, to exploration and new horizons. Without curiosity there would be no progress. I love working in the field of discovery feeling stunned and amazed everyday and seeking for the inventions, innovations and technologies that have the power to improve our environment, our health, our work, our lives, our world! Let’s improve the world we live in by being curious!

The mission I have set myself: 

"Find, explore, nurture and share the ‘NEXT’ Technologies that have the power to improve our environment, our health, our work, our lives, our world and prepare our clients and Capgemini for the next wave of these technologies."

My rules for my life, I encourage everyone to think about theirs; 

Show up always, be committed to excellence everyday, act in kindness of everyone, serve the world not just yourself, commit to live life to the fullest, find laughter, share tears, love with your whole heart, be yourself 100%, respect others, commit to a life of learning, stay curious, seek adventures, when you fall down get up, read, play, build don't destroy, drive positivity and always keep dreaming!

What's in the title....

Group Technology Director?! Do you remember that moment at the beginning of your career where you think 💭 "Wow one day I would love to do that"...... With Child Curiosity and as a technologist at heart that day is now for me! 

Really honoured and proud, New spirt, new mission, bigger playing field. Heading up Capgemini's Group Technology domain, working with our Chief Innovation officer Pascal Brier in Capgemini's TIV Function (Technology, Innovation and Ventures) and all our CTIO's to make Capgemini even more famous for our Technology & Innovation spirt and capabilities we have in our 350.000+ people strong Group! 

CTO/ Chief innovation / Inspiration / Innovation & technology Leadership / Artificial Intelligence / Chief Digital / IOT/ Strategic Future thinking / Design Thinking / SAP / Two Beautiful Daughters / Outdoors / Ultra Running / Trail running / Triathlons / Diving / Motorcycles / Soccer

profile_positions.description:
What's in the title....Group Technology Director?! Do you remember that moment at the beginning of your career where you think 💭 "Wow one day I would love to do that"...... With Childlike Curiosity and as a technologist at heart that day is now for me! 

Really honoured and proud to take up this new role! New spirt, new mission, bigger playing field. Heading up Capgemini's Group Technology domain, working with our Chief Innovation officer Pascal Brier in Capgemini's TIV Function (Technology, Innovation and Ventures) and all our CTIO's to make Capgemini even more famous for our Technology & Innovation spirt and capabilities we have in our 300.000 people strong Group! 

The mission I have set myself: 

"Find, explore, nurture and share the ‘NEXT’ Technologies that have the power to improve our environment, our health, our work, our lives, our world and prepare our clients and Capgemini for the next wave of these technologies."

I am super proud of the amazing teams of technologist looking after our 10 Technology Futures and 
delivering Tech insights, PoV, podcasts, blogs, Research and overall spirt of innovation and technology. With all this talent and thought leadership I'm more than confident that we all can #getthefuturewewant, and Im looking forward to contribute in strengthening our Thought Leadership. 

We as, Capgeminists, have always been proud of our capabilities to Deliver "do what you say and say what you do" for our customers. With the increasing speed of change it is now, more than ever, crucial to look forward and sense the direction of technology to prepare for the next steps, and that is exactly what we will deliver! 

What gets me up in the morning is "Curiosity" that is why I'm super excited for this role and all the cool new things I will learn and explore with our amazing people!

*Member of the Capgemini group Chief Technology, Innovation & Ventures council
*Member of the Capgemini Ventures Pre-Selection Committee
profile_positions.title: The Tech Guy

profile_positions.description:
I’m so lucky to have this amazing job with amazing people. Where I can use my talents and look after Technology, innovation our ecosystem of startups & partnerships for our global SAP, Package based solutions and Application business. And working with our 30000+ brilliant global family just makes it more fun….

When you get the opportunity like I have to be in this kind of leadership position, never forget that there are no leaders without followers. For me it is the amazingly talented and diverse global family that make this worthwhile. 

I love to learn from them and with them, to explore & experiment, to have fun, to share ideas and thoughts with the Motto: we will always stay curious! 

It shows, we keep growing and growing our business faster every year, we would now be officially a Unicorn 🦄 if we where a startup. Passing the 1B mark feels amazing even in a big corporate…and we are still accelerating our growth. (2B here we come) 

I’m super proud to be part of this amazing global family of brilliantly talented people!
profile_positions.title: Chief Technology & Innovation Officer Global SAP Business

profile_positions.description:
Being responsible for European innovation activities in the SAP service line,  I have the privilege to be part of the leadership team, leading our highly skilled expert teams in our 200+ people European center of excellence and 8500+ SAP experts in Europe to help our customers transform and adopt to the new digital age. Our mission is to help our customers to better serve their customer. Staying relevant in our high speed changing world of technology is becoming more difficult. By showing our customers how new technologies are impacting their current business models and help them to evolve and stay relevant in these fast developments. We help them to drive digital technologies adaptation and to envision new business model that will help them to achieve their vision and mission for the future.

Portfolio: 500M+ euro
People: EMEA 200+ &India 100+ direct, 
8500+ indirect

Also Responsible for managing the EMEA SAP related partnerships with: Google, Microsoft, SAP, AWS, Mulesoft, and some smaller startups.
profile_positions.title: Head of Innovation/ Board member European SAP CoE

profile_positions.description:
Driving Business by using applied innovation and smashing "BUZZwords" into usable solutions. As Seth Godin says: "be remarkable, go for the purple Cow", so let's make something happen!

Portfolio: 200M+ euro
People: 120+ EMEA 50+ India direct / 7500+ indirect
profile_positions.title: European Center of Excellence Lead NextGen Business Applications & IoT Platforms

profile_positions.description: Happy to share that I have been asked to join the Youbedo Corporation council board. A beautiful initiative, in a steward ownership jacket in a social enterprise. It is a non-paid position.
profile_positions.title: Council Member / Ambassador Youbedo corporation Board

profile_positions.description: New and fresh webdesign and application development company.
profile_positions.title: CO-Founder

profile_positions.description: Managing the selection and implementation of a new ERP-System. With a project group of 8 people I accepted the challenge to implement a new ERP-system developed by Glovia international. Glovia International is a globally operating company, and a part of Fujitsu. We also focused on new  process development and process restructuring , to accommodate the changes that were going to occur within the company by the use of the new ERP-system.
profile_positions.title: Projectmanager ERP implementation

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for Managing Operational excellence and Supply chain efficiency. Restructuring Production in our two plants to increase throughput reducing the stock and working capital, while maintaining and increasing Just in time delivery to our customers.

Developing a new system of planning that fits the company.
The goal is to setup a system that ensures the reliability of  the companies shipping.  This means the restructuring of the supply chain. For this a few flows are considered for overhauling, namely the material flow, the internal order flow, external order flow. The factory (men and machine) capacity  is being reevaluated to pin point bottle necks. The 5s model is used to restructure the factories WorkCentre’s and storage. The ultimate goal of these changes is to be able to implement LEAN production.
profile_positions.title: Manager Production Planning /supply chain

profile_positions.description: Youbedo is online-bookstore that needed help with their website Usability analyses and their Search Engine Optimization. So I volunteered may knowledge on this subject to help them out. We did a few usability sessions with a test subject group, so we could improve the website. I also helped them with optimization of Google analytics to fit their needs.
profile_positions.title: SEO & Usability volunteer

- Coordinating projects related to Market Research and communication for a range of companies; commercial companies, charities, educational and so on.
- Consulting on Market Research approches.
- Writing Market Research reports as wel as communications reports
- Consulting companies on Change Management
profile_positions.title: Project coordinator/consultant

profile_positions.description:
In August of 2009 I organized a beneficial bike ride to Sevilla, for "vrienden van het Radboud kinderziekenhuis". I started cycling on 31 of august from Nijmegen and finished on the 24 of september in Sevilla Spain after a trip of 2909 Km. I was sponsored 0,01 euros per Km by a lot of people, they helped me to raise 710 euros for the children's hospital.

http://www.mijnliefstewens.nl/page/69/home
http://alexnaarsevilla.waarbenjij.nu/
profile_positions.title: Beneficial bike ride to Sevilla
